data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.1 Dev Beta 5
data.expected_result: Blocked users' names shouldn't get stuck
data.short_description: Swiping a user off the screen in the blocked user list will make their name get stuck
data.steps_to_repro: - Block someone - Open the list of blocked users - Swipe one of them to the left, far off the screen
